const DList * fx_data_get_smlist ( void   ) 

get all the fetion's schedule sms info

this function will return a list which store the schedule sms info

Returns:
a dlist value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
A template to get all schedule sms info from the dlis struct 
 Fetion_Schedule_SMS *sch_sms = NULL;
        DList *tmp = (DList *)fx_get_smlist();

        while(tmp)
        {
        sch_sms = (Fetion_Schedule_SMS *) tmp->data;
                if(sch_sms) {
         // do something to access this structure...    
                }
                tmp = d_list_next(tmp);
        }

See also:
Fetion_Schedule_SMS DList

const Fetion_Schedule_SMS * fx_get_schedulesms_by_id ( int  id  ) 

get an schedule sms structure by schedue_sms_id

this function will return an schedule sms structure by schedue_sms_id

Returns:
a vaild value if successfully, otherwise return NULL..
the id you can got it by fx_data_get_smlist, or the paramter of fx_set_schedule_sms's message

See also:
Fetion_Schedule_SMS fx_data_get_smlist
